title: What is the GCash Express Send Transaction Limit
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

The Express Send Transaction Limit is a monthly limit that is placed on the number of send & receive transactions you can perform using Express Send.

### **How Does the Express Send Transaction Limit Work?**

At the start of each month, you’ll receive a **set limit of 550 Send & 500 Receive transactions with Express Send.**

**![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/44143770086553)**

You won’t be able to make any Express Send transactions for the rest of the month after you reach BOTH of these limits.

You can send and receive transactions again at the beginning of the following month. The same limits apply until you hit the maximum number of transactions.

If you are a merchant and want to use GCash without transaction limits, we encourage you to sign up for a [GCash Pera Outlet](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4408281111577-Paano-mag-apply-bilang-GCash-Pera-Outlet-Plus-Retailer) account.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How do I sign up for GPO?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4408281111577-Mag-apply-bilang-isang-GCash-Pera-Outlet-Partner)
- [I've exceeded my Express Send transaction limit in GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/44142420527257-I-ve-exceeded-my-Express-Send-transaction-limit-in-GCash-What-do-I-do)
- [Express Send Transaction Limit FAQS](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/44143447540505-Express-Send-Transaction-Limit-FAQS)
